main event: A Captain and a Major observed seven dull lighted objects in a V formation flying over Carswell AFB at a phenomenal rate of speed on July 24, 1949.
interesting points: Witnesses reported the objects emitting a bluish-white light,The objects were visible for only four to five seconds before fading away,The formation was as large as a fist at arm's length and was seen moving from South to North,The objects exhibited no sound or odor and had an incandescent luminosity,The sighting was corroborated by multiple credible military observers.
sighted object: seven dull lighted objects in a V formation
witness description: A Captain and a Major in the USAF, both considered reliable.
